title: The best one second a day app but
text: Please turn off the notification that happens every single day at midnight

title: A Diary for Life
text:
Have been using this since the pandemic. I love how one day creates a story that you don‚Äôt know how it‚Äôll unfold until you see it come together at the end of the year. 
Love sending Birthday snippets for my loved ones with their moments I‚Äôve had with them over the last 5 years.

title: Amazing app
text: This is such a great app‚ÄîI've been using it for years! I like being able to unlock new app icons but I wish there were a black and white icon and I also think it'd be cool if there were a 2,000 snippets icon that's gold.

title: The Best 1 Second App!
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for several years now, and it‚Äôs consistently been a very fun way to capture memories and have a nice journal at the end of the year. Several friends of mine ask about seeing my one second, because it really is such a wonderful experience. The main reason I‚Äôm writing this review after all these years is to commend the developers and 1 Second team for their dedication to providing a great user experience. They have a forum in which you can make suggestions, upvote posts you agree with, and what really stands out to me is that the development team actively engages with the forum. There was an update that made it more difficult to use the app, and I was overjoyed to see that their team had responded to the most upvoted post on the forum about changing it back, and saying that they were working on it. A week or so later, I got an email saying that the post had been resolved, and when I went on the app, it was back to how it was before! I would just like to express how much I appreciate the team being responsive to their user‚Äôs opinions and providing a community forum where user input is valued. When I first saw the update, I was distraught because I assumed I would have to try to find an equivalent to the app I love, as I‚Äôm so used to user input being like speaking into a void. I was very pleasantly surprised to find how easy it was to access the forum where I could express my opinion about the update, and even more delighted to have such a quick response to the issue and it being corrected so promptly. Thank you to the 1 Second Everyday team for caring about the people who love the app, and for actually valuing its consumers. Since discovering this app in 2019, collecting memories to add to it has become a routine part of my life. It‚Äôs super helpful to have an actual reason and reminder to capture the moments I spend with my friends and such :) I‚Äôve recommended the app to several people and will continue to do so, y‚Äôall rock!

title: Free trial is useless
text: Literally. Got free trial of pro. Still can‚Äôt use pro.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
text: Annoying I tried to press start and nothing happens canceling my membership

title: The best journal app
text: This is one of my favorite apps. I love the ease of creating videos and memories for myself without feeling like I have to create it through Instagram. The customer service is also really great anytime I‚Äôve had issues. If you are a new parent and want an easy way to look through your inevitable hundreds of photos/videos of your kids over the years, this is the perfect app for it.  I cannot recommend it enough!

title: Awesome App
text: I‚Äôve been using this app everyday for 5 years. It‚Äôs part of my daily routine and brings me a lot of joy. The app is stable and easy to use, and the subscription is priced appropriately.

title: Updates are almost always disappointing
text:
I do like this app quite a bit. Unfortunately, they mess around too much with a good product. I'd say if it ain't broke, don't fix it, but they often do. For example, I very much enjoyed that I could create a new snippet and post it to multiple projects at once. They just removed that feature for no apparent reason. Very annoying.

This has happened many times in the past ‚Äì they supposedly improve the app, but actually make it worse. 

An update a few weeks ago, for example, reset all my projects so the branding that I had turned off was turned back on. That was really cheap.

Their product team and their QA are disappointing.

title: Fun app!!
text: I use it everyday as my journal.

title: Who Knew That Watching A Movie About Your Life Could Be So Much Fun?
text: The design and thoughtfulness that went into this app is so apparent and appreciated. I absolutely love it!  I've been loading videos year by year onto my Iphone and to see a calendar full of orange days is exciting and addicting.  I literally want to find every video that I have and more importantly I'm so inspired to make the next day's second as memorable as it can be.  The process of snipping your favorite second of the day couldn't be easier and most importantly it's so much fun. Thank you!

title: Customer
text: Wonderful review and reminder. Great customer service.

title: üòóüëå
text: It‚Äôs a really great app, good at reminding you to do it, but doesn‚Äôt get too crazy like Duolingo. I enjoy clicking in the app and watching memories from the past year or so. Pretty easy to use, easy to customize. There are some ads, and they are all mostly to get the premium edition. You can change the app icon based on how many clips you have which is really fun.

title: Great memories
text: We used this app to document our daughter‚Äôs first year, and the compilation is one of my favorite videos ever. She‚Äôs 13 months now and we‚Äôre still keeping up with her daily clips, starting a new yearly tradition for her and any future kids. I just love seeing the slow progression of her growth in the span of a 10 minute video.

title: One of my favorite apps!
text: I‚Äôve been using this app daily for the last 5 years. It‚Äôs so simple to use and edit your videos. It gives me a way to look back at all I‚Äôve done and remind me of the interactions that make us human. The support is super friendly and helpful as well! Give it a try!

title: Used to be great, new update is not user-friendly
text:
I've been using this app every day for two years, and before that off and on for three years. It was always pretty intuitive to be able to take a video right in the app, the new update in January 2025 has made it a multi step process, and not particularly easy to get there. Hopefully this is fixed soon.

On a separate note, I am constantly being sent emails saying that my projects/data is going to be deleted because it's not backed up. After logging in and checking, it is backed up. Frustrating to get these sorts of emails about once a month.

title: Wont Load
text:
Spent one whole year 2024 using this app everyday and it won‚Äôt load my. year. I keep getting error 1004 message. I must say. I downloaded it for a specific reason and now it doesn‚Äôt work after 365 days! Very Disappointing!! 
I don‚Äôt recommend at all.

title: Best App Ever
text: I‚Äôve been making videos with this app for a couple of years now.  It‚Äôs so easy to use and makes the best memories for me and my family.  I always get asked how I make my videos because they are so professional looking.

title: Small changes make it not as great but still love the app
text: First off, I‚Äôve been using this app for several years to make sweet yearly videos of my kids. It‚Äôs incredible to see how much they grow in just one year and they get a big thrill out of watching their videos. They continue to make changes to the app that are annoying however. Now the clip captions are a hidden field only accessible after adding the clip. Wish that was a default field like it used to be. Also, because the premium version is really expensive for an app, I stick with the free version. I appreciate that I have the option to add more than 2 clips to a day but the required ads are incredibly obnoxious, have gotten longer and now I have to watch the almost one minute ad for every extra video clip over the standard two. It used to be that if I watched an ad once per calendar date, all the extra clips for that day would be covered. Please fix these changes if you don‚Äôt want to drive your user base away.

Please bring back the camera on the home dashboard. It is tedious and time consuming to go into the calendar to add a snippet. And it‚Äôs making me not want to capture my day. Also please stop with pushing pro. It is annoying to have to close out of it every time I open the app. I know it‚Äôs an option.

title: Subscription Kills Yet Another App
text: Why do you need a subscription model for something like this? It‚Äôs ruined it and has only shown greed. There‚Äôs other apps that can do this without telling the App Store users that they are nothing but a constant money stream.

title: Newest update broke being able to add songs
text:
*thank you for fixing the bug with being able to add your own music* 

Overall I like the app, but the newest update broke being able to add my own music. You can only add their provided music. I also wish you could choose between horizontal or vertical videos as well as being able to add multiple music tracks. The clipping of the videos isn‚Äôt as precise as I‚Äôd like it to be, often I have to select a clip, watch it and readjust because it‚Äôs a few seconds too early or past the point I wanted captured.

title: constant glitches
text: for some reason, the app freezes any time i attempt to retroactively add snippets. i can only add snippets day of, and can no longer upload from my photo library. i have to full close the app if it freezes, otherwise nothing works.

title: Aggressive advertisements have made this app clunky to use
text:
When I first started using this at the beginning of 2023, it was great. But since then, the in-app advertisements for their expensive ‚Äúpro‚Äù version have slowly become completely obnoxious to the point of being off-putting. The ads for premium are aggressive‚Äî you can‚Äôt even add a second to your day without one popping up.
I like your app and would be happy to pay a few dollars one time for a premium version, but not $50/year! Your pricing is ridiculous and I‚Äôve had to stop recommending the app to my friends and family because of the ads.

title: So many beautiful memories
text: I started doing this the year I got married, and now 9 years and 3 kids into our marriage it is so wonderful to look back on how much our life has changed, how our kids grow day by day, and just to see all these moments in our life that would‚Äôve otherwise been forgotten. It‚Äôs crazy how seeing a 1 second clip can remind me of a whole day or event. The app only gets better each year, I‚Äôm so thankful for this!

title: Nice
text: It‚Äôs really cool to look back through a whole year, my mom shared hers to us (her kids) and some of the snippets were really funny. It‚Äôs nice to look back on a while year in about ten minutes.

title: Poor customer support, no resolution
text:
I paid for this app before it became severely overpriced. Even with the receipt, no one could help me. I was, instead, passed from rep to rep with huge delays in responses. Clearly they don‚Äôt care about their customers or the people that believed in their business before they were so large (and greedy). Horrible experience.

*an update to their comment: like I said above, I already tried to get help and it was refused/denied. Did you even read the above?

title: Feature removed - not as good
text: The most recent update took away a feature on the home page that made the app for me. Now I get frustrated opening the app.

title: Great App
text:
Great app, been a subscriber for several years. The latest update, v5 broke the ability to add your own music. I hope they fix it soon.

They fixed the issue!  Pay for the app. It‚Äôs worth it!!!

title: Alas the ads
text:
Among the many ads that are mandatory to watch these days in order to have more than one clip per day, I certainly prefer the scammy&short Jackpot ads(15s) than the legit&long Dropbox ads(60s). Worst still are the candy crush ads that claim to be 20seconds but freeze and turn into 30 seconds in the end. That‚Äôs 30 seconds in exchange for 1 ‚Äî for what I regard as a thoughtfully crafted app, maybe at least eliminate the ads that encourage people to gamble money in a game rather than at the casino?

I‚Äôm just waiting for the photos app to evolve into something that just compiles clips automatically in the background so I can eventually stop relying on this one.

title: best decision i‚Äôve ever committed to
text: this is my 5th year ofc 1se and i love ts, i didn‚Äôt think id stick to it this long but now its part of my routine. i love looking back each month and seeing my life, it makes me really happy! especially at the end of the year getting to watch everything

title: Constantly freezes and looses edits
text: So frustrating. App constantly freezes up and then looses edits I‚Äôve made.

title: UI refresh why??
text: In 5.0.2, I don‚Äôt have a button to quickly take my 1 second‚Ä¶ why!? That‚Äôs the major point of the app. Why does it take 4 clicks to get to the spot to record it!?

title: the greatest time capsule
text: this app is incredible. i have been using this for 6 years and to see my life, day by day, is so beautiful. I have my main ‚Äúlife‚Äù project, which I occasionally journaling and have clips from most days for the past six years. From that I have these branches that I have created such as moments in nature, different cities, I‚Äôve lived in or for specific friends or aspects of my career. So beyond just my main life, I do have all these other montages of specific areas or people. this is a great gift when celebrating an anniversary or a friendship because especially if they aren‚Äôt expecting, it can be such a wonderful gift to them! It synced to the cloud and I don‚Äôt have to worry about it disappearing. Be able to watch each year and review at the end of the year is wonderful because it truly puts into perspective how full my life is. I can also hide things if I want it just for me and I can journal moments within the journal settings. There are times like a week or months without posting and it‚Äôs so nice because they have a feature that doesn‚Äôt auto fill so everything from your camera roll just gets put into the week or month you choose and you can fill in that space. it can also turn Live Photos into video which is such an useful feature. I‚Äôve gotten in the habit of taking video or photos often so that can always translate into this app easily. This is truly been a life-changing app and for the decades to come I‚Äôm so excited to watch my life story.

title: New update is awful
text: I‚Äôve loved this app and have happily paid for the extra snippets for years but this new update is really screwed up. Please go back to the way it was before!

title: Had to delete and redownload the app to get the ‚Äúmy music‚Äù feature to work again
text: I had to redownload the app after it updated to fix the music issues, other than that, it‚Äôs a solid app.

title: Meh
text: Options get less and less every year.  Can‚Äôt even add free cheesy music anymore. Not worth getting pro with how easy it is to create a free Reel with one second daily clips and music of choice.

title: UPDATED
text:
Loved this app. I even got over the fact that most of it is now under a paywall. I don‚Äôt think I can get past the fact that I have to watch an ad after every snippet I add. Its making the process absolutely tedious and unenjoyable. I think I‚Äôll be finding a way to make my own video without the fees or ads. I don‚Äôt mind an ad here and there, but it‚Äôs taking me way longer to make this year. 

How disappointing, because this is a really good app. It doesn‚Äôt make me want to subscribe (I can‚Äôt afford to pay $50/app in this economy and time is crunched these days. I know we‚Äôre supposed to add a snippet daily so we don‚Äôt have to try to cram it in at the end of the year, but I just don‚Äôt remember at the end of each day. I‚Äôm in a busy season in life and I just can‚Äôt remember everything. It always took a long time to do at the end of the year, but now it‚Äôs just awful.

title: Adding Additional Snippets Bug
text: Ever since we could choose to add multiple snippets simultaneously, they broke the ‚Äúwatch ad to unlock additional snippets‚Äù button. Now you watch an Ad, go to add a snippet, and it says you need pro. Watched an ad for nothing!

title: Can‚Äôt us own music like past years.
text: Please fix this so I can add my own music like past years. I‚Äôm using the same song as last year so I know it‚Äôs t should work.

title: Bring back feature
text: (Free version) Until the recent update, multiple daily videos were allowed- if we watched ads. Now, there is an option to watch ads for adding extra content, but this results in a subscription upgrade message only. Bring back the capability please. I‚Äôm wrapping up my first full year of using the app (I do enjoy it) but on my occasional ‚Äúbusy‚Äù day, I‚Äôd like to have the ability to document it.

title: Recent changes are not good
text:
I love this app. I've been using it since Christmas 2023 and it's awesome having daily memories recorded, even little things I might forget like snippets of my dogs playing together. 

However, recently the app has been pushing the Pro subscription a lot harder than before. I used to be able to watch an ad to unlock the ability to add multiple snippets to a single day. Then it changed to where I had to watch an ad for every single snipper, instead of unlocking the day. So if I wanted to add five snippets, I'd have to watch four ads instead of one. That's annoying, but fine. It's on me not wanting to pay for the Pro plan so I don't mind watching some ads to support the app. 

But now, it still shows the option to watch an ad to add more snippets. But after watching the ad, it says that's a Pro feature and won't let me add any more snippets. Honestly that's probably false advertising from a legal standpoint, since the button still says that if you watch an ad it will unlock another snippet for that day. 

This needs to be fixed one way or the other. Either let me add another snippet after watching an ad, or remove the button to watch an ad entirely. 

This is not a one-off issue either. I have tried repeatedly, watching like ten ads a day over the past few days, and it has completely stopped letting me add a second snippet to a day no matter how many ads I watch. 

This app is great, and I would pay for the Pro plan if I could afford it. But $50/year is a lot to spend annually just to unlock a few features I don't often need anyway. And shoving it down my throat by gradually forcing me to buy it or lose features is not the way to go about getting a customer.

title: Won‚Äôt let me sign in
text: App won‚Äôt let me sign in with new phone.

title: Recent update makes scanning videos hard
text: Recent update makes scanning videos hard. Whatever this check mark is on add snippet completely breaks my workflow of scanning videos for my one second. What‚Äôs worse is that if I play along with the feature, the feature is broken‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs stuck with a progress bar for some reason.

title: trash after recent update unless you pay
text: i‚Äôve been using this app for years and use the multiple snippet option, which is free if you watch an ad. now you watch the ad to add an additional snippet only to be blocked for a ‚Äúsubscriber only‚Äù option. this has turned me away from using this app, beyond the ridiculous subscription price the fact that bugs can‚Äôt be checked BEFORE an update is rolled out is ridiculous.

title: Multiple Snippet Error
text: I‚Äôve been using the app since my baby was born last year (it was recommended to me by a friend). A few months back a feature was added to watch an ad and you get to add an extra snippet. Now, after the recent update, it still offers a free snippet if you watch an ad BUT after watching the ad and you go to add an extra snippet, it says multiple snippets are just for pro members. So either the free option needs to be removed since it‚Äôs misleading, or it needs to be fixed.

title: Memories
text: This is a pretty good and simple to use app. I recommend.

title: Not worth
text: I used to look forward to this app every year‚Ä¶ UNTIL THEY STARTED CHARGING FOR IT! Very disappointing

title: Favorite app and great customer service!
text: I have been using 1 Second Everyday for several years and I love it!! I haven‚Äôt missed a day in years. It is a lovely way to look back over events and it has a very practical side too! Often, I don‚Äôt remember when something happened and it‚Äôs a fabulous resource to go back and find the event. It works well. Rarely glitches and the couple of times I have had issues the customer service team is amazing!! They respond so fast and stick with you until it‚Äôs fixed. Highly recommend it.

title: Best app for memories
text: I love 1SE! I have been using it for years now to collect all of the years memories.

Several friends of mine ask about seeing my one second, because it really is such a wonderful experience. The main reason I‚Äôm writing this review after all these years is to commend the developers and 1 Second team for their dedication to providing a great user experience. title: So many beautiful memories
text: I started doing this the year I got married, and now 9 years and 3 kids into our marriage it is so wonderful to look back on how much our life has changed, how our kids grow day by day, and just to see all these moments in our life that would‚Äôve otherwise been forgotten. It‚Äôs crazy how seeing a 1 second clip can remind me of a whole day or event. The app only gets better each year, I‚Äôm so thankful for this!

title: Nice
text: It‚Äôs really cool to look back through a whole year, my mom shared hers to us (her kids) and some of the snippets were really funny. It‚Äôs nice to look back on a while year in about ten minutes.

title: Poor customer support, no resolution
text:
I paid for this app before it became severely overpriced. Even with the receipt, no one could help me. I was, instead, passed from rep to rep with huge delays in responses. Clearly they don‚Äôt care about their customers or the people that believed in their business before they were so large (and greedy). Horrible experience.

*an update to their comment: like I said above, I already tried to get help and it was refused/denied. Did you even read the above?

title: Feature removed - not as good
text: The most recent update took away a feature on the home page that made the app for me. Now I get frustrated opening the app.

title: Great App
text:
Great app, been a subscriber for several years. The latest update, v5 broke the ability to add your own music. I hope they fix it soon.

They fixed the issue!  Pay for the app. It‚Äôs worth it!!!

title: Alas the ads
text:
Among the many ads that are mandatory to watch these days in order to have more than one clip per day, I certainly prefer the scammy&short Jackpot ads(15s) than the legit&long Dropbox ads(60s). Worst still are the candy crush ads that claim to be 20seconds but freeze and turn into 30 seconds in the end. That‚Äôs 30 seconds in exchange for 1 ‚Äî for what I regard as a thoughtfully crafted app, maybe at least eliminate the ads that encourage people to gamble money in a game rather than at the casino?

I‚Äôm just waiting for the photos app to evolve into something that just compiles clips automatically in the background so I can eventually stop relying on this one.

title: best decision i‚Äôve ever committed to
text: this is my 5th year ofc 1se and i love ts, i didn‚Äôt think id stick to it this long but now its part of my routine. i love looking back each month and seeing my life, it makes me really happy! especially at the end of the year getting to watch everything

title: Constantly freezes and looses edits
text: So frustrating. App constantly freezes up and then looses edits I‚Äôve made.

title: UI refresh why??
text: In 5.0.2, I don‚Äôt have a button to quickly take my 1 second‚Ä¶ why!? That‚Äôs the major point of the app. Why does it take 4 clicks to get to the spot to record it!?

title: the greatest time capsule
text: this app is incredible. i have been using this for 6 years and to see my life, day by day, is so beautiful. I have my main ‚Äúlife‚Äù project, which I occasionally journaling and have clips from most days for the past six years. From that I have these branches that I have created such as moments in nature, different cities, I‚Äôve lived in or for specific friends or aspects of my career. So beyond just my main life, I do have all these other montages of specific areas or people. this is a great gift when celebrating an anniversary or a friendship because especially if they aren‚Äôt expecting, it can be such a wonderful gift to them! It synced to the cloud and I don‚Äôt have to worry about it disappearing. Be able to watch each year and review at the end of the year is wonderful because it truly puts into perspective how full my life is. I can also hide things if I want it just for me and I can journal moments within the journal settings. There are times like a week or months without posting and it‚Äôs so nice because they have a feature that doesn‚Äôt auto fill so everything from your camera roll just gets put into the week or month you choose and you can fill in that space. it can also turn Live Photos into video which is such an useful feature. I‚Äôve gotten in the habit of taking video or photos often so that can always translate into this app easily. This is truly been a life-changing app and for the decades to come I‚Äôm so excited to watch my life story.

title: New update is awful
text: I‚Äôve loved this app and have happily paid for the extra snippets for years but this new update is really screwed up. Please go back to the way it was before!

title: Had to delete and redownload the app to get the ‚Äúmy music‚Äù feature to work again
text: I had to redownload the app after it updated to fix the music issues, other than that, it‚Äôs a solid app.

title: Meh
text: Options get less and less every year.  Can‚Äôt even add free cheesy music anymore. Not worth getting pro with how easy it is to create a free Reel with one second daily clips and music of choice.

title: UPDATED
text:
Loved this app. I even got over the fact that most of it is now under a paywall. I don‚Äôt think I can get past the fact that I have to watch an ad after every snippet I add. Its making the process absolutely tedious and unenjoyable. I think I‚Äôll be finding a way to make my own video without the fees or ads. I don‚Äôt mind an ad here and there, but it‚Äôs taking me way longer to make this year. 

How disappointing, because this is a really good app. It doesn‚Äôt make me want to subscribe (I can‚Äôt afford to pay $50/app in this economy and time is crunched these days. I know we‚Äôre supposed to add a snippet daily so we don‚Äôt have to try to cram it in at the end of the year, but I just don‚Äôt remember at the end of each day. I‚Äôm in a busy season in life and I just can‚Äôt remember everything. It always took a long time to do at the end of the year, but now it‚Äôs just awful.

title: Adding Additional Snippets Bug
text: Ever since we could choose to add multiple snippets simultaneously, they broke the ‚Äúwatch ad to unlock additional snippets‚Äù button. Now you watch an Ad, go to add a snippet, and it says you need pro. Watched an ad for nothing!

title: Can‚Äôt us own music like past years.
text: Please fix this so I can add my own music like past years. I‚Äôm using the same song as last year so I know it‚Äôs t should work.

title: Bring back feature
text: (Free version) Until the recent update, multiple daily videos were allowed- if we watched ads. Now, there is an option to watch ads for adding extra content, but this results in a subscription upgrade message only. Bring back the capability please. I‚Äôm wrapping up my first full year of using the app (I do enjoy it) but on my occasional ‚Äúbusy‚Äù day, I‚Äôd like to have the ability to document it.

title: Recent changes are not good
text:
I love this app. I've been using it since Christmas 2023 and it's awesome having daily memories recorded, even little things I might forget like snippets of my dogs playing together. 

However, recently the app has been pushing the Pro subscription a lot harder than before. I used to be able to watch an ad to unlock the ability to add multiple snippets to a single day. Then it changed to where I had to watch an ad for every single snipper, instead of unlocking the day. So if I wanted to add five snippets, I'd have to watch four ads instead of one. That's annoying, but fine. It's on me not wanting to pay for the Pro plan so I don't mind watching some ads to support the app. 

But now, it still shows the option to watch an ad to add more snippets. But after watching the ad, it says that's a Pro feature and won't let me add any more snippets. Honestly that's probably false advertising from a legal standpoint, since the button still says that if you watch an ad it will unlock another snippet for that day. 

This needs to be fixed one way or the other. Either let me add another snippet after watching an ad, or remove the button to watch an ad entirely. 

This is not a one-off issue either. I have tried repeatedly, watching like ten ads a day over the past few days, and it has completely stopped letting me add a second snippet to a day no matter how many ads I watch. 

This app is great, and I would pay for the Pro plan if I could afford it. But $50/year is a lot to spend annually just to unlock a few features I don't often need anyway. And shoving it down my throat by gradually forcing me to buy it or lose features is not the way to go about getting a customer.

title: Won‚Äôt let me sign in
text: App won‚Äôt let me sign in with new phone.

title: Recent update makes scanning videos hard
text: Recent update makes scanning videos hard. Whatever this check mark is on add snippet completely breaks my workflow of scanning videos for my one second. What‚Äôs worse is that if I play along with the feature, the feature is broken‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs stuck with a progress bar for some reason.

title: trash after recent update unless you pay
text: i‚Äôve been using this app for years and use the multiple snippet option, which is free if you watch an ad. now you watch the ad to add an additional snippet only to be blocked for a ‚Äúsubscriber only‚Äù option. this has turned me away from using this app, beyond the ridiculous subscription price the fact that bugs can‚Äôt be checked BEFORE an update is rolled out is ridiculous.

title: Multiple Snippet Error
text: I‚Äôve been using the app since my baby was born last year (it was recommended to me by a friend). A few months back a feature was added to watch an ad and you get to add an extra snippet. Now, after the recent update, it still offers a free snippet if you watch an ad BUT after watching the ad and you go to add an extra snippet, it says multiple snippets are just for pro members. So either the free option needs to be removed since it‚Äôs misleading, or it needs to be fixed.

title: My favorite app!!!
text: I‚Äôve been using the 1SE app since 2016 to remember little moments from each day, and it‚Äôs been so much fun. I look forward to watching each compilation when it‚Äôs done, and love looking back years later ‚Äî the one second videos can take me right back to any particular season. title: Never could resolve issue
text:
I used this 3x (2018, 2020, 2022) and loved it with no issues. 
Now‚Ä¶ they‚Äôve come out with new features, different layout, the app looks great! Even gives you an easy way to get direct contact for help. 
Unfortunately I‚Äôm no longer using this app b/c the feature of watching an ad to add a second snippet for the day keeps giving me an error. I‚Äôve reached out to customer service and we‚Äôve troubleshooted everything, I even got a new iPhone, it‚Äôs still not working and it was just my dealbreaker there. The rep said she‚Äôs contacted the company who services the ads but nothing seemed wrong there, but it‚Äôs not just my phone! I‚Äôve tried this on another iPhone and it gave the same error. Looks like the ad company is faulty, 1SE needs to look into it.

title: love love love

I‚Äôve been recording my 1 second everyday for over 3 years now, and I‚Äôve never missed a day. Its seen me through high school, through the end of the pandemic, through friendships, tough times, and beautiful, amazing moments in my life. I cannot be more grateful for this app. If you are considering downloading it, please do. It really is such a beautiful reminder that even when you‚Äôre struggling, there‚Äôs always at least one good second in every day.

title: Just one thing‚Ä¶
text: I love the app, and have made some very cool projects on it. I love being able to pick the song for my project, but some songs I wanna use are simply too fast for allowing the clips to switch on beat. It would be amazing to be able to set the bpm to a non-whole number. One song I wanted to use was 119 bpm, but I didn‚Äôt want all my clips to be half a second long. When I set it to 60, after a while it was off beat. Being able to just set it to 59.5 would‚Äôve been perfect, but I could only pick a whole number. Other than that the app is really fun and allows for some fun memories.

Plus, great customer service when I was having some uploading issues.

title: cool thought. too pricey.
text: the idea of this app is awesome. we talked about it during a work meeting and we al thought it sounded so fun to try it out. i downloaded and found a 7 day free trial and then 3 plan options. 49.99/ year. 9.99/month. 249.99 for lifetime access. seems wild considering i can record on my camera app and then store in a separate calendar. but for those who want it all nice in curated in one location, and don‚Äôt mind paying for it, then probably a great app. just wish they would be transparent with the pricing PRIOR to me downloading and upping their download count. seems like inaccurate statistics considering i immediately deleted.

title: Amazing

title: WARNING FRAUDULENT APP
text: This app offers a 7 day free trial but if you sign up for it you will be charged 49.99 immediately. I assumed that Apple is vouching for app developers, but no, they can charge your card and Apple will not refund you. My request was denied twice by Apple. The Apple support representative told me this app looks sketchy (no contact information on their support page) but I needed to contact the app developer about their fraudulent charge. As of now, I‚Äôm out $50 and I want people to know that Apple does not guarantee that these third party app developers will deliver what they claim or that they will not charge your card.

I do have one simple question however. I want to have my project on another device as well but even if I log into the account that has my 1SE streak, it doesn‚Äôt come up on my new phone. How can I continue on my new phone so I don‚Äôt have to use my old one any longer?

title: 1 Second Everyday
text: I have been using this app for 5 years. I love photography, storytelling, and daily recordings so it is a permit fit for me. The video format enables hearing the voices of people I love, listening to music if playing, understand the context of pictures, and enjoy sounds of nature. The support staff is attentive and extremely helpful when solving issues and/or answering questions.

title: 1 Second Everyday
text:
"I have been using this app since 2018.  I love photography, storytelling and documenting on a daily basis so it is perfect for me.  I especially enjoy the video feature because I can record the voices of people I love, music playing, and the sounds of nature.  Even if I am at home alone and it is too cold to go outside, I take pictures of things in my house I treasure like a book I'm reading, a favorite painting, a plant, the fireplace warming, a pet.  The support staff is amazing - attentive and thorough if there is an issue 
or a question.  I highly recommend this app."

title: Super helpful

title: Fun app!

title: The Best!

title: Great app unless something goes wrong

title: Fantastic app that I use everyday
text: Started using the app to track my first child growth and never stopped. Now have another project going for my second child. Love the rewind feature, which shows you the moments from past years. Easy to input and easy to watch playback. Became a pro member because I feel more secure that these memories are backed up.

title: Could be a great app but so buggy
text: I have been using this app since 2015. I keep hoping they will work out all the bugs. But alas, the same problems persist. It crashes all the time. It takes a while to load so if you are quickly trying to take your daily video, the moment has passed before the in app camera works. Instead, you have to take a video. Then go into the app and upload it. Kind of annoying for an app designed to be used every day. I tried to export a 5 year video to give to my husband for our anniversary, but I can‚Äôt download the video because the app is so buggy. The concept is incredible. I‚Äôll probably hang on as a user in the hopes that it will improve.

title: I love this app!
text: I love having a tiny clip from each day. This app lets you make videos for the year, month, or even just a week. I love seeing my memories from previous years pop up in my rewinds every day! Easy to use, great support when I have questions!

title: Love the app
text: It‚Äôs so much fun to see what happened in years past, sometimes I forget what or where I was and 1 sec brings it all back. Great app

title: Keeps getting worse
text: I am so confused why they keep updating this app. I have been using this app since 2017 and almost all of the updates have been negative. The UI keeps changing for no particular reason (font sizes and type, doesn‚Äôt auto prompt for captions, location of overlays), free features become paywalled, more and more notifications saying ‚ÄúGo pro or you will lose all your snippets!‚Äù, and so on. The one feature they introduced that I really liked (shows you snippets from all prior years on that day), they just removed in the most recent update. I would switch to something else but I am so invested I have to keep using it. Really disappointing overall. Makes me wonder if the devs and PMs enjoy making the app worse ü§î

title: Wonderful App
text: I have been using this app since 2019 almost every day. I love being able to look back to previous years and see what I did on any given day. Today I went to record and I noticed I can no longer see past years under today's date. Is this a glitch? A change? Something that is now in only the pro version? Please help! This was one of my favorite features.

title: Best App
text: I love this app and have used it for years. Great way to capture memories and life.

title: Love this!
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for a couple of years now. I absolutely love it. I push play and watch my year in review often, and I always make people watch it with me on New Year‚Äôs Eve before a new one starts. It is so cool to see your year flash by in 365 seconds.  The way that each square on the calendar opens up the pictures you have on your phone from that day, makes it so quick and easy to use daily or to even catch up when you‚Äôre a few days behind after a vacation. Great app, one of my absolute favorites.

title: User friendly
text: I just finished making a year-long video, one second a day. The app made it really easy to do. Everyday i‚Äôd take a video or Live Photo (those work too) with my iPhone camera app and about once a week i‚Äôd go into the app and choose a second for each day from the videos. The app shows a calendar and has a little video symbol on each day that you took a video, when you click on the day it pulls up all the videos on your camera roll from that day. Basically it sorts everything for you and makes it really easy to do. Some days I forgot to take a video, and would just add two videos from another day. You can edit each clip in the app. The end result turned out really great, and these memories of my young kids will be so special in years to come. They changed a lot in one year!

title: I really like this app.
text: On a whim, I decided to download it in order to document my senior year of high school. I haven‚Äôt missed a day of the last year and the app has encouraged me to take more pictures. I am looking forward to looking back at the last year.

title: Unfortunate
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for 3 years now and have loved it until now. Over time I‚Äôve seen many free features turned into paid features and i think it will only get worse. 1 freestyle project and backups of 365 snippets used to be free, but now every snippet has this massive exclamation mark on it saying i need to pay and back it up. And even tho i don‚Äôt need the freestyle project anymore, i can‚Äôt delete it cause that means I‚Äôll lose my free freestyle forever. I can‚Äôt even optimize my space because that costs money. The logo on the summary videos are much more obtrusive now compared to the beginning of the year when it was subtly in the corner. Now it‚Äôs in your face massive right on the center side and if I want it to go away I need to pay. I think I might move apps soon tbh

title: Love! But recent glitches!! PLEASE FIX
text: I LOVE 1SE. I‚Äôve been consistently using it since fall of 2019, and it‚Äôs one of my favorite things! However, recently I‚Äôve been having issues with getting into the journal sections of the app. Usually, it‚Äôs a quick tap and I‚Äôm in and can type up my journal entry for the day. Now it either takes numerous tries or doesn‚Äôt work at all. This is devastating, and it‚Äôs caused me to fall way behind in my usual daily photo and journal updates. PLEASE FIX!!!

title: Love the app
text: I‚Äôve been using the app for a few years now & it‚Äôs been such a positive experience. I ran into an issue with transferring my photos to a new device for the first time today and sent a message to support after 10pm, not expecting a reply for at least 24 hrs. To my surprise, I got a response within minutes and my issue is now resolved.

title: Charged me $50 even though I didn‚Äôt buy premium
text: It‚Äôs fine but they charged me without my awareness

title: Switched to a subscription model
text: I paid for this app some time ago but now they constantly ask for a subscription or show ads. It used to be a great app but now I can‚Äôt stand to use it. Please at least offer a grandfather option for the users who already paid to download the original app. You don‚Äôt have to offer the new features for free, but it would be nice to not show ads or paywalls for those who already paid.

title: App has gone downhill
text: I have been a subscriber for two years (and this isn‚Äôt a cheap app!). Sad to say I will not be renewing. The app has gone so far downhill. It‚Äôs super buggy and there are issues that can only be resolved through back and forth conversations with their chat‚Ä¶ which still don‚Äôt always work. Definitely recommend looking elsewhere!

title: Make notifications stop!
text:
I love the app, but please for the love of all that is holy make the notifications stop. I‚Äôve turned them off in the app, and even in iOS. The app ignores all this and keeps reminding me to use it, even though I‚Äôve used it every day for the last two years. It even reminds me AFTER I‚Äôve already recorded the second for that day. 

This ‚Äúfeature‚Äù has survived reboots , reinstalls, etc. It‚Äôs clearly a bug at this point.

title: Awesome app ,great customer service
text:
I‚Äôve been using 1sed for quite some time now and it‚Äôs fun and easy to use. 
I‚Äôve only ever had one issue and contacting customer service and addressing it was a breeze. 
I love seeing my little mash ups at the end of the month. I‚Äôd recommend this app to everyone.

title: Great customer service
text: The app has been great for documenting the past few years of my daughters lives, the latest reconciliation of closing old accounts revealed to me that I actually had two accounts. They‚Äôre super responsive and I can tell they work hard.

title: Best app for new parents
text:
1 second every day is the amount of time I have to spend on compiling family photos with an infant, and this app is absolutely perfect. Auto fill makes it so easy to edit and we watch the compilation of our six month old‚Äôs life all the time. 

The only 2 improvements I‚Äôd suggest:

It‚Äôs a little annoying having to select all manually  when I want to play from the beginning, even though I appreciate the ability to select week or month and do occasionally want to use those.

I also wish it were easier to add a bunch of the clips from one project to another with one tap each.

title: App is ok but now the caption is too small
text:
My previous issue has been fixed, I can still add too clips per day. Thank you.

I have a new issue‚Äîthe new caption format is way to small. The original caption was already too small but the new default is so small I have trouble reading it even with my glasses on. I suspect it‚Äôs less small when you do your 1SE in portrait but I do mine in landscape. Please allow us to set our own default caption format! It is so frustrating to have to manually choose every time I export (I export everyday). Thanks!

My previous review:
Thanks to the devs for fixing a recent bug that just seemed unfair. It‚Äôs still a little dodgy take away the ability to save 2 clips per day from new users. I still feel like the fee to go premium is too high and wish that we could sink our projects to iCloud or other services that would not require much from the devs. But it is what it is. Thanks again for fixing the bug for us grandfathered in.

title: Used to love it‚Ä¶
text: Every time I record a clip I‚Äôm asked if I want to pay to have the clips on all my devices. I keep saying no. I‚Äôm tired of being asked. Thinking of finding a different app‚Ä¶

title: Best App on my phone
text:
I have been using the App since 2016 and absolutly love it. It is easy to use, but if you need help the support team is fantastic, super fast and easy to understand replies. 
I only wish I had this App when my kids were little.

title: 10 years of one seconds GONE
text:
I‚Äôve lost 10 years of 1seconds and I‚Äôm beyond devastated. I don‚Äôt know why they deleted it. I was absolutely using it, and I deleted the app off my phone for storage issues (I was transferring to a new phone), thinking it would be safe within my account. When I tried to sign in again, my account was GONE. 
Absolute loss of words, 10 YEARS GONE. Beware of this app deleting your info!

title: Thank you
text: This app contains so many memories for me, and whenever I‚Äôm having a hard time, I can always look back and appreciate everything that has happened. Tysm for keeping this app running.

title: They deleted my account that was grandfathered from the beginning
text: Marilyn scammed me out of my grandfathered account. I supported this company from the beginning, and they deleted my account and told me it was my fault because I hadn't used it in the past 18 months. No loyalty. I was reaching out to BBB and filing a complaint.

title: Love this app BUT‚Ä¶ üëáüèæ
text:
Long time user and love this app, but Inwish there was a way to upload videos from the previous day. 

For example, it‚Äôs Monday night for me right now but it‚Äôs 1:51am so it‚Äôs technically Tuesday. So the videos I create right now isn‚Äôt showing up for the Monday upload cause it counts as a Tuesday 

Would be amazing if yall changed this üôèüèæ‚ô•Ô∏è

title: Watch ads for multiple posts is broken
text:
It‚Äôs a wonderful app. Well designed. Easy to use. The compilations are fun to watch.

But the watch ads to post multiple clips never works. I consistently have to sit through three or four ads before it finally unlocks. These aren‚Äôt the short ads either. I totally understand needing ads to monetize but don‚Äôt tell me I‚Äôm going to get something for the ads then not deliver.

title: Great
text: I‚Äôve had this app for a few years now and I really like it. There does seem to be a glitch for the leap year üòÇ but I find it more amusing than anything else. It‚Äôs nice to see growth from year to year

title: This app is the best.
text:
I have been using this app EVERYDAY for the past 3 years. It has never charged me, or made
me pay to use it. You get so many great things for free. Being able to see basically my entire life from the past 3 years is amazing. This app is literally my favorite

title: An emotional app I literally use every day
text:
With the exception of my photos themselves, this app is probably the single most important app in my phone emotionally. It has been a remarkable change in my life to be able to look back on all of the moments that I want to remember in such a compact format. my memory gets jogged of things that I had momentarily forgotten about, and I smile every single time I playback one of the videos.

I know this is one of the more expensive subscriptions as far as a mobile app is concerned, but for me, it is worth the cost. Partially because I know from experience that this team running the app has personal investment in seeing it succeeded. I once had a bug in the app where I was having trouble getting access to my older videos, and their support team responded promptly, and a software fix was issued very shortly afterwards. These folks get it, and this is a service that I am happy to pay for. 

The app itself is easy to use, and the push notifications are ones I actually find genuinely helpful to remember to record my segment every day. I also love the ability to create ad hoc projects that are specific to a particular trip or event. This is an app that I genuinely wish I had many years ago. Thanks 1SE team. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Used to be so easy
text: I enjoyed using this app 2016-17, but I fell out of the habit of updating it. Thought I would return, but the interface is needlessly overcomplicated from what it used to be. Sad!

title: Suddenly unresponsive??
text: Not sure why my app suddenly keeps freezing, but it‚Äôs really annoying to be a premium member and have it waste my time.

title: Why The Change?
text: I used to have this app and loved it but I wasn‚Äôt using it too often so I deleted it. I redownloaded it because I wanted to record some stuff and now you have to pay for a subscription??? I understand that you need to make money, but you literally can only have one journal now and the rest you have to pay for which I know it wasn‚Äôt like previously. It just seems so janky to me, why change it? If it was a one time fee I might‚Äôve bought but I will not be paying every month for this app.

title: Best Video Journal
text: This app is fun and easy to use. It makes a great video diary of your year or use it to make a fun video journal of a vacation, etc. I‚Äôve been using it for about five years and I love how user-friendly it is. And customer service is A++ if you need support.

title: great app! a few things tho.
text:
first off i don‚Äôt like the ads they put in now but it‚Äôs fine. the main thing is, whenever i save my monthly videos and am exporting them, im able to add music to it if i want, but it only works for Apple Music. i wish it worked for Spotify, i always use spotify and i have spotify premium but i don‚Äôt ever use apple music. 

other than that tho the app is pretty cool

title: Love 1SE for photo journaling my life!
text: Try it, you‚Äôll love it! I‚Äôve been using the PRO Version the last few years and love all the additional features that are available and their Customer Service is always helpful if needed üòÄ

title: Not intuitive and ridiculously priced
text: This is a good idea for an app but the interface is incredibly unintuitive and they are insane for the amount they charge to upgrade to pro. $250 for a lifetime use is, frankly, dumb. And what‚Äôs included (or the lack of what‚Äôs included) in the free version is insulting. Straight up not worth it.
